section.p: The Three Fortunes are the goddesses of fate, who weave the tapestry of all men’s lives. A placard outside the temple declares: ‘Join the temple and see your luck change overnight!’ Inside, a vast wall painting shows a three-faced deity with six limbs hurling down nuggets of gold from a palace among the clouds.
